gui.wizard-staff.no_magic.name: No Magic
gui.wizard-staff.blaze_powder_magic.name: Flame Thrower
gui.wizard-staff.carved_pumpkin_magic.de: Create a large slow moving shadow that damages and weakens everything it touches.
gui.wizard-staff.clock_magic.name: Time Dilation
gui.wizard-staff.egg_magic.name: Eggization
gui.wizard-staff.egg_magic.description: Shoot a purple ray of magic at entities, trapping them inside an egg.
gui.wizard-staff.elytra_magic.name: Magic Helicopter
gui.wizard-staff.elytra_magic.descriptio: Rotate your staff quickly enough to lift from the ground.
gui.wizard-staff.gold_magic.name: Midas Touch
gui.wizard-staff.gold_magic.description: Turn regular stone into something more valuable.
gui.wizard-staff.jukebox_magic.name: Magic Music
gui.wizard-staff.jukebox_magic.descripti: Emit an irresistible tune from the staff, forcing nearby enemies to dance.
gui.wizard-staff.wizard_staff_magic.name: Staff-ception
gui.wizard-staff.obsidian_magic.name: Portal to Hell
gui.wizard-staff.obsidian_magic.descript: Open a portal to the nether. WARNING: One way only!
gui.wizard-staff.netherrack_magic.name: Walk on Lava
gui.wizard-staff.netherrack_magic.descri: Like Frost Walker but for lava, simple as that.
gui.wizard-staff.wither_skull_magic.name: Skull Projectile
gui.wizard-staff.wither_skull_magic.desc: Use magic to replicate the powerful Wither attack.
gui.wizard-staff.ghast_tear_magic.name: Fire Immunity
gui.wizard-staff.ghast_tear_magic.descri: Use magic to enhance your crying, immediately extinguishing flames from you.
gui.wizard-staff.nether_brick_magic.name: Fortress Locator
gui.wizard-staff.nether_brick_magic.desc: Use your magic to sense the direction of the nearest Nether Fortress.
gui.wizard-staff.soul_sand_magic.name: Hands from Below
gui.wizard-staff.soul_sand_magic.descrip: Summon skeletal hands from the ground in front of your, damaging and slowing entities they touch.
gui.wizard-staff.gold_nugget_magic.name: Magic Bartering
gui.wizard-staff.gold_nugget_magic.descr: Use magic compel nearby Piglins to give you their items.
gui.wizard-staff.lodestone_magic.name: Magical Translocator
gui.wizard-staff.lodestone_magic.descrip: Right click a lodestone with the staff, binding you to the lodestone. Then, activating the staff anywhere in the world will return you to the lodestone, consuming it in the process.
gui.wizard-staff.netherite_ingot_magic.d: Transmutate the item in the staff into a fireproof wizard staff.
gui.wizard-staff.wizard_boots_fashion_ma: Transmutate the item in the staff into a pair of wizard boots.
gui.wizard-staff.wizard_chestplate_fashi: Transmutate the item in the staff into a wizard robe.
gui.wizard-staff.wizard_helmet_fashion_m: Transmutate the item in the staff into a wizard hat.
gui.wizard-staff.wizard_leggings_fashion: Transmutate the item in the staff into a wizard skirt.
gui.wizard-staff.druid_boots_fashion_mag: Transmutate the item in the staff into a pair of druid boots.
gui.wizard-staff.druid_chestplate_fashio: Transmutate the item in the staff into a druid robe.
gui.wizard-staff.druid_helmet_fashion_ma: Transmutate the item in the staff into a druid animal skull.
gui.wizard-staff.druid_leggings_fashion_: Transmutate the item in the staff into druid pants.
gui.wizard-staff.warlock_boots_fashion_m: Transmutate the item in the staff into a pair of warlock boots.
gui.wizard-staff.warlock_chestplate_fash: Transmutate the item in the staff into a warlock robe.
gui.wizard-staff.warlock_helmet_fashion_: Transmutate the item in the staff into a warlock cowl.
gui.wizard-staff.warlock_leggings_fashio: Transmutate the item in the staff into warlock chainmail.
gui.wizard-staff.blue_dye_magic.name: Weather Controller
gui.wizard-staff.bricks_magic.name: Portable Wall
gui.wizard-staff.bricks_magic.descriptio: Surround yourself by magic bricks, creating a safe space.
gui.wizard-staff.grappling_hook_magic.de: Use the staff as a grappling hook.
gui.wizard-staff.feather_magic.name: Slow Fall
gui.wizard-staff.feather_magic.descripti: Use magic to dampen the effects of gravity, slowing your fall.
gui.wizard-staff.mushroom_cloud_magic.de: Create a magic poison cloud in from of you, damaging anyone that enters it, slowly turning them into mushrooms.
gui.wizard-staff.shulker_bullet_magic.de: Use magic to replicate a shulker bullet, targeting a nearby entity.
gui.wizard-staff.water_bucket_magic.name: Conjure Water
